OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: The site comprises an area of cleared former school buildings abutting the former school playing field area (3ha) which is also in public (Council) ownership and allocated for approximately 100 dwellings in Policy H3.9 of the Local Plan. The brownfield site became available following plan adoption, but It is anticipated that both sites would logically come forward as a single development scheme.
